mapper.select: SELECT ST_AsMVT(MVTGeom.*) FROM (SELECT ST_AsMVTGeom(t.geom, ST_MakeEnvelope(#{tileMinLongitude}, #{tileMinLatitude}, #{tileMaxLongitude},#{tileMaxLatitude}), 4096, 0, true) AS geom, t.name FROM geohash_point t WHERE ST_INTERSECTS(t.geom, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakeEnvelope(#{tileMinLongitude}, #{tileMinLatitude}, #{tileMaxLongitude}, #{tileMaxLatitude}),4326))) AS MVTGeom WHERE MVTGeom.geom IS NOT NULL;
